summary: Creative Full Stack Developer, with over 5 years of experience delivering robust, reliable and elegant web applications. Currently focused on Web Applications and AI-integrated systems using Python, JavaScript, TypeScript and cloud technologies. Experienced in Full Stack development, UX/UI design, LLMs, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), and modern frameworks like LangChain, FastAPI and Next.js. Experienced in deploying web applications, especially on AWS infrastructure. Passionate about building reliable applications with intuitive interfaces and seamless user experience. Committed to continuous learning and self-improvement.

work.summary: Improving engineering efficiency through AI tools.
tasks: Research and integration of LLM based systems for internal developer workflows.
Contribute, develop and maintain LLM-powered AI applications.
Improve the Retrieval Augmented Generation application.
highlights: Contributed to the development and improvement of a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) application, that uses internal technical documentation, to enhance engineer's efficiency, using LLMs, LangChain and FastAPI.
Optimized system performance, code readability and maintainability by refactoring the code and implementing best practices.
Improved the performance of the application by integrating novel techniques to enhance the RAG pipeline.

tasks: User Interfaces and User Experience design and enhancement.
Maintenance and updates of existing projects.
highlights: Developed custom applications for clients from scratch, with custom databases, APIs, user interfaces and deployed in AWS Cloud.
Developed several websites for a wide variety of clients, from an insurance company to an architecture and construction company.
Helped many customers to build a strong position online developing their websites and enhancing its SEO.

work.position: Senior Service Engineer and IT Engineer
work.summary: Engineering and Technical Service for Medical Equipment.
tasks: Site planning and installation of medical imaging devices, such as X-Ray Systems, CT Scanners, MRI Scanners, Ultrasound Systems
Maintenance and repair of medical imaging devices.
Customer support and customer success engineer.
IT support for internal processes, applications and tools.
highlights: Helped several customers with their needs and problems related to medical imaging devices, and the infrastructure required to operate them properly.
Directed and collaborated in the planning and installation of several medical imaging devices.
Incorporated IT systems and services in the company, optimizing the productivity and removing the need for manual work and paper usage.

projects.name: Ingelin Clients Platform
projects.summary: Web Platform for Ingelin's clients. Through the platform clients can check their devices status, service reports and more.
projects.description:
A web platform developed for Ingelin's customers.
The platform lets customers check their service related data, such as the devices' status, the active contracts and orders placed, and the devices' service reports.
The platform also lets customers place service tickets, and request contract renewals.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.summary: My personal portfolio with my most important projects.
projects.description:
My personal portfolio showing my experience, education, and the most recent or important projects I have developed during my work as Full Stack Developer.
The website features an elegant design with a fully animated interface.

projects.name: WorkHub Jobs App
projects.summary: Simple job board application with job post filtering and job entry page.
projects.description:
A simple job board application that uses a third party job post API.
The application has filtering options and a dedicated job entry page.
This simple application has been developed as a technical test during a job interview process.

projects.name: Bayas Freire Website
projects.summary: Website for Bayas Freire architecture and construction firm.
projects.description:
This website has been developed for Bayas Freire, an important architecture and construction firm in Ecuador.
The website was developed mainly for marketing purposes, showcasing their projects, but it also shows their current and on sale projects, with all technical information about them.

projects.name: Internal RAG System
projects.summary: Contributed in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system to enhance development efficiency.
projects.description:
Contributed to the development of a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system that uses internal technical documentation to enhance engineers' efficiency, using LLMs, LangChain, FastAPI and Python.
Optimized system performance, code readability and maintainability by refactoring the code and implementing best practices.
Improved the performance of the application by integrating new techniques to enhance the RAG pipeline.

projects.name: Gesture Detection System
projects.summary: Project for my Master Thesis at UPC. Development of a Gesture recognition system based on an inertial sensor.
projects.description:
Project developed for my master thesis at UPC. Development of a gesture detection system based on an inertial sensor.
The goal of the project was to evaluate the performance of different neural network sizes and architectures on diverse embedded systems, running on real-time.
This project was founded by the 'Siemens Energy AI Chair: Energy Sustainability for a Decarbonized Society 5.0' (TSI-100930-2023-5), funded by the Secretary of State for Digitalization and Artificial Intelligence through the ENIA 2022 Chairs call, and co-funded by the European Union-Next Generation EU.

projects.name: Ingelin Website
projects.summary: Website for Ingelin. A medical imaging devices distribution firm in Ecuador
projects.description:
This website was developed for Ingelin, a medical equipment technical service and distribution firm based in Ecuador.
The website was developed mainly for marketing purposes, showing their protfolio of products and services.

projects.name: ADV Medical Website
projects.summary: Website for ADV Medical. A medical imaging devices distribution firm in Ecuador
projects.description:
This website was developed for ADVmedical, a medical equipment distribution firm based in Ecuador.
ADVmedical is the official distributor of Samsung Healthcare in Ecuador.
The website was developed mainly for marketing purposes, showing their portfolio of products and services.

projects.name: Ingelin Management System
projects.summary: Platform for engineering and management support. Based on the API developed for Ingelin.
projects.description:
Application developed to support engineering and management tasks for Ingelin.
This project covers the user interface, which is based in the API developed for Ingelin.
The application lets users manage clients, clients' devices, spare parts, contracts and fill digital service reports. The system sends automatically the reports to the customers via email, once they are completed. The system has improved the company efficiency and eliminated the need for manual work and paper usage.

projects.name: Ingelin API
projects.summary: API developed for the service support application for Ingelin.
projects.description:
This project is the backend service for the management and engineering support application for Ingelin and the clients' platform.
The backend was developed as an API REST, with the whole databased designed and developed from scratch.

projects.name: Aprosar Website
projects.summary: Website for Aprosar, an insurance company in Ecuador
projects.description:
Website developed for Aprosar, an insurance broker firm in Ecuador.
The website shows their complete products' portfolio and it lets users select request specific products according to their needs.

courses.title: Multi-variable Control Systems
content: Analysis and design of linear and non-linear controllers for MIMO systems
